data.title: Carnival in Flanders Original 1950s Polish A1 Movie Poster
data.meta_description: Original 1950s Polish A1 poster by Antoni Uniechowski for the 1935 film Carnival in Flanders (La kermesse heroique) directed by Jacques Feyder with Francoise Rosay / Andre Alerme / Jean Murat / Louis Jouvet.
data.text:
